mapper.sql: id, user_id AS userId, user_level AS userLevel, first_share_num AS firstShareNum, second_share_num AS secondShareNum, remark, create_date AS createDate, create_user AS createUser, update_date AS updateDate, update_user AS updateUser, delete_flag AS deleteFlag
mapper.select:
SELECT sc.user_id as userId,u.nickname as userName,sc.user_level as userLevel,sc.first_share_num as firstShareNum, sc.second_share_num as secondShareNum,sc.create_date as createDate,sc.remark FROM wwq_share_count sc LEFT JOIN wwq_user u ON u.id = sc.user_id WHERE sc.delete_flag = 0 AND u.delete_flag =0
and u.nickname like '%${userName}%'

select 1 as level, suc.user_id as userId,up.nickname as userName,up.headimgurl,u.nickname as parentUserName from wwq_share_user_concart suc left join wwq_user u on u.open_id=suc.parent_id left join wwq_share_count sc on sc.user_id=u.id left join wwq_user up on up.id=suc.user_id where parent_id='#{userId}'
union
select 2 as level,wu.id as userId,wu.nickname as userName,wu.headimgurl,u.nickname as parentUserName from wwq_share_user_concart suc left join wwq_user u on u.id=suc.user_id left join wwq_share_user_concart psuc on psuc.parent_id=u.open_id left join wwq_user wu on wu.id=psuc.user_id
where suc.parent_id='#{userId}'
